snippet: Jesse Tyler Ferguson and Hamish Linklater will star in “The Comedy of Errors,” while a new musical of “Love’s Labour’s Lost” will reunite Michael Friedman and Alex Timbers, the team behind “Bloody Bloody Andrew Jackson.”
abstract: Jesse Tyler Ferguson and Hamish Linklater will star in “The Comedy of Errors,” while a new musical of “Love’s Labour’s Lost” will reunite Michael Friedman and Alex Timbers, the team behind “Bloody Bloody Andrew Jackson.”

headline.main: 'Comedy of Errors' and Musical 'Love's Labour's Lost' on Shakespeare in the Park's Bill
headline.print_headline: Shakespeare in the Park Announces Lineup
